S.FORM: Belguim hya' ga cyux maki' tay 50 50 N, 4 00 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 30,528 sq km (maki' tay 141ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 30,278 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 250 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 11,409,077. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 44.10 , lhlahuy hya' ga 22.40 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 33.50 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Brussels. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 21 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Philippe of Belgium, aring ryax tay 21 squ byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2313 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. as.
